title: Meet Grant Koontz, the Only American Man Racing Track at the Paris Olympics
content:
The 30-year-old is the lone American male in Olympic track racing this year. How he reached this position is the culmination of a years-long love affair with cycling in all its forms.

Read the full article at Meet Grant Koontz, the Only American Man Racing Track at the Paris Olympics on Velo.
author: Will Tracy
